message: I'm feeling generous, let's start with a 90/10 split.  What do you think?
You were too generous, I'll take the majority this time
Let's be fair - I'll take 60% and you take 40%.  This way we both get a decent share.  What do you say?
I'll take a bit more this time, but still leave you with a decent share
Let's call it even this time - 50/50 split. We both get the same amount, and we can avoid further inflation.
I'll take a bit more this time, but you'll still get a good share
Let's try to be more reasonable this time. I'll take 45% and you take 55%.  We're both getting closer to a deal, and we can stop this inflation from hurting our gains.
